body.name: Nepali Cherish Greeting Card & Envelope Box Set with Handmade Lokta Paper from Nepal, 15 Greeting Cards (Cornflower)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Kathmandu Valley Co. Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs
features: HANDMADE VINTAGE 15-CARD SET: 4x6 inch all-occasion cards (fifteen total) with accompanying envelopes made following a 1,000-year-old paper-making process in Nepal.

HANDMADE PAPER: Tree-free, sustainable paper handmade from the Lokta bush which grows in the Himalayan Mountains of Nepal. Cuttings are cooked to a mashy pulp and spread by hand over boxed screens and set to dry outside, making a tough, acid-free paper with a beautiful texture.

FOR SPECIAL OCCASIONS: Truly unique greeting cards great for every occasion. Use them for wedding thank you cards, invitations, birthday, graduation, Mother's Day, Father's Day, or special acknowledgements.

HIMALAYAN GREETINGS: Lokta paper makes its way from the Nepali mountain villages to Kathmandu where it is made into the cards. Each card contains natural flecks and texture unique to the art of hand-crafted Lokta paper.
HANDMADE IN NEPAL: Supports Nepalese artisans and preserves a 1,000-year-old Nepalese tradition of paper making by hand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vintage Stationery Set Handmade with Tree-free Lokta Paper A Special Tradition - Following a handmade paper-making tradition of over 1,000 years, these Lokta paper all-occasion greeting cards are a special way to send a special message and feature cornflower petals added during the creation of the paper. Sustainable Paper - The paper comes from Lokta bushes which grow in the Himalayan mountains of Nepal. This tree-free bush grows back quickly when cut, making it a sustainable source. The fibrous inner-bark is cooked into a mash and then spread by hand across boxed screens, forming the paper as it dries and hardens in the Himalayan sunshine. A Beautifully Unique Texture - Lokta paper has a unique texture with one side showing the intricate pattern from the screen used to create the paper, and the other side, called the sun-kissed side, shows a more natural and varied texture. Lokta paper has a fabric-like feel making it a special choice for invitations, thank-you notes, or other special greetings.

Vintage Stationery Set Handmade with Tree-free Lokta Paper A Special Tradition - Following a handmade paper-making tradition of over 1,000 years, these Lokta paper all-occasion greeting cards are a special way to send a special message and feature cornflower petals added during the creation of the paper. Sustainable Paper - The paper comes from Lokta bushes which grow in the Himalayan mountains of Nepal. This tree-free bush grows back quickly when cut, making it a sustainable source. The fibrous inner-bark is cooked into a mash and then spread by hand across boxed screens, forming the paper as it dries and hardens in the Himalayan sunshine. A Beautifully Unique Texture - Lokta paper has a unique texture with one side showing the intricate pattern from the screen used to create the paper, and the other side, called the sun-kissed side, shows a more natural and varied texture. Lokta paper has a fabric-like feel making it a special choice for invitations, thank-you notes, or other special greetings.

Send that Special Note with a Special Handmade Touch A Great Gift Set - The greeting cards come with matching envelopes which are also hand made with Lokta paper. The cards, envelopes, and gift box feature cornflower petals added in the creation of the paper. Say Thank you in a Special Way - Send that special note of gratitude or use the set as a gift along with the included gift box. The fibrous nature does allow for some feathering and ghosting if writing with pens with heavy ink. Go Natural - The paper contains natural flecks from the lokta bark which adds to its character and making each card unique. Kathmandu Valley Co. paper is 100% lokta. Give your project a taste of nature and a beautiful handmade touch.

Send that Special Note with a Special Handmade Touch A Great Gift Set - The greeting cards come with matching envelopes which are also hand made with Lokta paper. The cards, envelopes, and gift box feature cornflower petals added in the creation of the paper. Say Thank you in a Special Way - Send that special note of gratitude or use the set as a gift along with the included gift box. The fibrous nature does allow for some feathering and ghosting if writing with pens with heavy ink. Go Natural - The paper contains natural flecks from the lokta bark which adds to its character and making each card unique. Kathmandu Valley Co. paper is 100% lokta. Give your project a taste of nature and a beautiful handmade touch.

Thank you for Supporting a 1,000-year-old Paper-making Tradition The oldest surviving Lokta paper is a copy of the Karanya Buha Sutra Buddhist text, estimated to be 1,000 to 1,900 years old. Lokta Paper is still used today for official Nepali government documents and has been produced in a similar fashion for centuries. Thank you for being a part of a tradition that spans over 1,000 years of handmade paper making in Nepal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy touch for a personal note.
reviews.reviewText: So. It seems that I am getting old, because at a mere 40 years old, I fondly miss the days of getting handwritten notes from people. Sure, texting is convenient and quick but we lose so much. So, in giving out gifts to my friends' young children, I decided to give a handwritten note along with a silver dollar to each of them. (Yes, a note reflecting on the previous year and a good old-fashioned silver dollar. I *AM* only 40 years old!)Well, this paper is beautiful. It's not something I would necessarily send through the mail, but it's fine for giving in person. I also bought a nice wax seal kit to give it another special touch. The paper itself is soft and textured, and the artistic flare is beautiful. I was concerned that the liquid ink pens I prefer would bleed right through the soft paper, but there was no bleed at all! Soft, elegant, beautiful, and durable, I expect these notes to still be in great condition when the kids read the notes in 20 years! Here's hoping they cherish the thought for a moment before tossing the note in the trash and pawning the silver dollar for cash! :) Whatever they do with the gifts is their business but I am thrilled with the artifact I was able to share.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Eco Friendly Set
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this set of cards and envelopes and the way they feel. I would definitely recommend this for gifts too. The only drawback is that the envelopes don’t have any sealant but that’s not a problem for me. There’s no reason to seal them unless you’re mailing them. There is always the option to tuck the flap inside or get wax and a personalized stamp for the wax when either gifting in person or including within a gift when mailing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look handmade... awesome!!!
reviews.reviewText: Made from Lokta plant... flowers in the paper and envelopes. The box is beautiful and makes this a stunning 🎁 gift!!! I love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique. High-Quality. Returning customer.
reviews.reviewText: This stationary is so lovely. I love the natural, delicate texture and there are just the right amount of petals throughout. I always receive compliments when I send notes on this paper. The only possible downside is that there isn’t any glue on the envelope to seal it, but it’s no big-I just use my kid’s glue stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute for thank you cards
reviews.reviewText: Used these for wedding thank you cards and they’re adorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond Precious Notes
reviews.reviewText: I save these for people who would understand what went into making this paper. The flowers are perfectly suspended in the pulp. Magical! The paper is very soft, almost like fabric, and highly textured. The envelopes do not have adhesive, but I use double sided tape to seal them when I mail the notes. The responses from friends who received them is pure delight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORGEOUS and well worth it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mom who truly appreciates quality. The handmade paper from Nepal is second to none! The detail of the drawings felt like holding fine art. My momma LOVES these note cards. Her generation doesn't text or send emojis. If you're looking for a tangible-hand-written way of communicating with someone, these are it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and worth the cost, especially for terrific quality and presentation.
reviews.reviewText: If in doubt- buy it and forgive yourself by using it to make someone'sday through using it!-Wow is this beautiful! Perfect for notecards with several pens, no bleeding. Box is perfect to set anywhere to display. Envelopes are thin yet perfectly sized, same as notes. No cop out other fill ins or junk mixed in to bump the quantity. Each piece is lovely. Only slight negative is pricing is almost out of reach for me, but hopefully it goes to the crafters in a decent percentage. I missed good old fashioned letter writing though my handwriting is nothing to write home about. (Get it->yawn<) This unusual paper will hopefully overcome my feeble attempts at glorious penmanship. Not super thin like the tissue, but thin, to be used gently. Ok for couples, or anyone, not too frilly- just natural, with petals, leaves and fibers. Delivery was prompt and well packaged.
